lead_paragraph: Sebastian Coe, the chairman of the organizing committee for the next Summer Games, will have a difficult time matching the spectacle of the Beijing Games in London in 2012.
snippet: Sebastian Coe, the chairman of the organizing committee for the next Summer Games, will have a difficult time matching the spectacle of the Beijing Games in London in 2012.
